snippet.title: Texas school district's RFID tracking of students goes to court
snippet.description: ...A Texas high school sophomore has filed suitagainst San Antonio's Northside Independent School District, seeking to block her expulsion for refusing to wear a radio frequency identification badge in school. The girl and her parents are claiming the policy is a violation of her First Amendment rights, citing religious beliefs as the reason she has refused to wear the badge.Northside began iss...

snippet.title: Simpsons, Powerpuff Girls porn nets jail time for Australian
snippet.description: ...We'll just come right out and say it: some people are into cartoon porn. Heck, even if you're not "into" it, you may have accidentally happened upon it just by running an innocent Google Image Search with SafeSearch turned off (guilty as charged). snippet.title: Schools can't stop wondering what students do on Facebook
snippet.description: ...It's graduation season, which means that students, teachers, and administrators alike are all thinking about one thing: Facebook.Schools around the globe have a fascination withindeed, sometimes a fixation onthe social networking site and what their students are getting up to online. Questions about the appropriate response to student material on social networking sites have existed for year...
